content: Ha detto che non era canadese.
translations: eng:He said he wasn't a Canadian
eng:He said that he wasn't Canadian
eng:He said that he wasn't a Canadian
eng:She said she wasn't a Canadian
eng:She said that she wasn't Canadian
eng:She said that she wasn't a Canadian
